dct_title_s: Effigies antiquae Romae ex vestigiis aedificiorum ruinis : testimonio veterum auctorum fide : numismatum monumentis, aeneis, plumbaeis, saxeis, tiglinisque
dct_description_sm: Bird's-eye view of ancient city of Rome as it might have looked at time of Emperor Augustus; relief shown pictorially. "Per xiiii [sic] regiones in quas urbem divisit Imp. Caesar Aug. : Pioque IIII [sic] Pont. Max. dicata excuderunt Romae Michael et Franciscus Tramezini, 1561." Reprint of the 1561 original, sold by Scudellari in 1820-1830.
dct_subject_sm: Augustus Emperor of Rome 63 B.C.-14 A.D.
Augustus, Emperor of Rome, 63 B.C.-14 A.D.
dcat_theme_sm: Augustus Emperor of Rome 63 B.C.-14 A.D.
Augustus, Emperor of Rome, 63 B.C.-14 A.D.
